title: Bug 49536: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns a response with HTTP code 200 OK and no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: The expected behavior is for the server to return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL with no webapps deployed.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the server
